sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SKIN, in anatomy, the general covering of the body of any animal. See Anatomy, n o 74.
Skin, in commerce, is particularly uſed for the membrane ſtripped off the animal to be prepared by the tanner, ſkinner, parchment-maker, & c. and converted into leather, & c. See Tanning.
